meeting_request.purpose: Need help staying in my major and understanding my weaknesses
meeting_request.description: Hi, I’m Jacqueline, a second-year Psychology major. I’ve taken a lot of interesting and challenging courses, but lately I’ve been struggling to keep up. Some of my classes have covered topics like addiction, trauma, and mental health, and I’ve found them really interesting but not necessarily applicable to my major. I’m also feeling frustrated because I’ve been doing well in other parts of my life, like my extracurriculars and academic performance overall, but I’m not sure if I should be in this major anymore. I’d really appreciate help understanding what's been happening and how to improve my academic performance without dropping the major entirely.
